BuildBotLocale.name: BuildBotLocale
BuildBotLocale.description: Grants permission to build an existing bot locale in a bot

CreateBot.name: CreateBot
CreateBot.description:
Grants permission to create a new bot and a test bot alias pointing to the DRAFT bot
                                                version

CreateBotAlias.name: CreateBotAlias
CreateBotAlias.description: Grants permission to create a new bot alias in a bot

CreateBotChannel.name: CreateBotChannel
CreateBotChannel.description: Grants permission to create a bot channel in an existing bot

CreateBotLocale.name: CreateBotLocale
CreateBotLocale.description: Grants permission to create a new bot locale in an existing bot

CreateBotVersion.name: CreateBotVersion
CreateBotVersion.description: Grants permission to create a new version of an existing bot

CreateExport.name: CreateExport
CreateExport.description: Grants permission to create an export for an existing resource

CreateIntent.name: CreateIntent
CreateIntent.description: Grants permission to create a new intent in an existing bot locale

CreateIntentVersion.name: CreateIntentVersion
CreateIntentVersion.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified intent.

CreateResourcePolicy.name: CreateResourcePolicy
CreateResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to create a new resource policy for a Lex resource

CreateSlot.name: CreateSlot
CreateSlot.description: Grants permission to create a new slot in an intent

CreateSlotType.name: CreateSlotType
CreateSlotType.description: Grants permission to create a new slot type in an existing bot locale

CreateSlotTypeVersion.name: CreateSlotTypeVersion
CreateSlotTypeVersion.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified slot type.

CreateUploadUrl.name: CreateUploadUrl
CreateUploadUrl.description: Grants permission to create an upload url for import file

DeleteBot.name: DeleteBot
DeleteBot.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot
DeleteBot.dependentActions:
lex:DeleteBotAlias
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteBotChannel
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteBotLocale
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteBotVersion
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteIntent
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteSlot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteSlotType

DeleteBotAlias.name: DeleteBotAlias
DeleteBotAlias.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot alias in a bot

DeleteBotChannel.name: DeleteBotChannel
DeleteBotChannel.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot channel

DeleteBotChannelAssociation.name: DeleteBotChannelAssociation
DeleteBotChannelAssociation.description: Deletes the association between a Amazon Lex bot alias and a messaging platform.

DeleteBotLocale.name: DeleteBotLocale
DeleteBotLocale.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot locale in a bot

DeleteBotVersion.name: DeleteBotVersion
DeleteBotVersion.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot version

DeleteExport.name: DeleteExport
DeleteExport.description: Grants permission to delete an existing export

DeleteImport.name: DeleteImport
DeleteImport.description: Grants permission to delete an existing import

DeleteIntent.name: DeleteIntent
DeleteIntent.description: Grants permission to delete an existing intent in a bot locale

DeleteIntentVersion.name: DeleteIntentVersion
DeleteIntentVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of an intent.

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

DeleteSession.name: DeleteSession
DeleteSession.description: Grants permission to delete session information for a bot alias and user ID

DeleteSlot.name: DeleteSlot
DeleteSlot.description: Grants permission to delete an existing slot in an intent

DeleteSlotType.name: DeleteSlotType
DeleteSlotType.description: Grants permission to delete an existing slot type in a bot locale

DeleteSlotTypeVersion.name: DeleteSlotTypeVersion
DeleteSlotTypeVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of a slot type.

DeleteUtterances.name: DeleteUtterances
DeleteUtterances.description:
Deletes the information Amazon Lex maintains for utterances on a specific bot and
                                                userId.

DescribeBot.name: DescribeBot
DescribeBot.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot

DescribeBotAlias.name: DescribeBotAlias
DescribeBotAlias.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot alias

DescribeBotChannel.name: DescribeBotChannel
DescribeBotChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot channel

DescribeBotLocale.name: DescribeBotLocale
DescribeBotLocale.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot locale

DescribeBotVersion.name: DescribeBotVersion
DescribeBotVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot version.

DescribeExport.name: DescribeExport
DescribeExport.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing export
DescribeExport.dependentActions:
lex:DescribeBot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DescribeBotLocale
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DescribeIntent
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DescribeSlot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DescribeSlotType
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:ListBotLocales
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:ListIntents
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:ListSlotTypes
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:ListSlots

DescribeImport.name: DescribeImport
DescribeImport.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing import

DescribeIntent.name: DescribeIntent
DescribeIntent.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing intent

DescribeResourcePolicy.name: DescribeResourcePolicy
DescribeResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

DescribeSlot.name: DescribeSlot
DescribeSlot.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing slot

DescribeSlotType.name: DescribeSlotType
DescribeSlotType.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing slot type

GetBot.name: GetBot
GetBot.description:
Returns information for a specific bot. In addition to the bot name, the bot version
                                                or alias is required.

GetBotAlias.name: GetBotAlias
GetBotAlias.description: Returns information about a Amazon Lex bot alias.

GetBotAliases.name: GetBotAliases
GetBotAliases.description: Returns a list of aliases for a given Amazon Lex bot.

GetBotChannelAssociation.name: GetBotChannelAssociation
GetBotChannelAssociation.description:
Returns information about the association between a Amazon Lex bot and a messaging
                                                platform.

GetBotChannelAssociations.name: GetBotChannelAssociations
GetBotChannelAssociations.description: Returns a list of all of the channels associated with a single bot.

GetBots.name: GetBots
GetBots.description:
Returns information for the $LATEST version of all bots, subject to filters provided
                                                by the client.

GetBotVersions.name: GetBotVersions
GetBotVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific bot.

GetBuiltinIntent.name: GetBuiltinIntent
GetBuiltinIntent.description: Returns information about a built-in intent.

GetBuiltinIntents.name: GetBuiltinIntents
GetBuiltinIntents.description: Gets a list of built-in intents that meet the specified criteria.

GetBuiltinSlotTypes.name: GetBuiltinSlotTypes
GetBuiltinSlotTypes.description: Gets a list of built-in slot types that meet the specified criteria.

GetExport.name: GetExport
GetExport.description: Exports Amazon Lex Resource in a requested format.

GetImport.name: GetImport
GetImport.description: Gets information about an import job started with StartImport.

GetIntent.name: GetIntent
GetIntent.description:
Returns information for a specific intent. In addition to the intent name, you must
                                                also specify the intent version.

GetIntents.name: GetIntents
GetIntents.description:
Returns information for the $LATEST version of all intents, subject to filters provided
                                                by the client.

GetIntentVersions.name: GetIntentVersions
GetIntentVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific intent.

GetSession.name: GetSession
GetSession.description: Grants permission to retrieve session information for a bot alias and user ID

GetSlotType.name: GetSlotType
GetSlotType.description:
Returns information about a specific version of a slot type. In addition to specifying
                                                the slot type name, you must also specify the slot type version.

GetSlotTypes.name: GetSlotTypes
GetSlotTypes.description:
Returns information for the $LATEST version of all slot types, subject to filters
                                                provided by the client.

GetSlotTypeVersions.name: GetSlotTypeVersions
GetSlotTypeVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific slot type.

GetUtterancesView.name: GetUtterancesView
GetUtterancesView.description:
Returns a view of aggregate utterance data for versions of a bot for a recent time
                                                period.

ListBotAliases.name: ListBotAliases
ListBotAliases.description: Grants permission to list bot aliases in an bot

ListBotChannels.name: ListBotChannels
ListBotChannels.description: Grants permission to list bot channels

ListBotLocales.name: ListBotLocales
ListBotLocales.description: Grants permission to list bot locales in a bot

ListBots.name: ListBots
ListBots.description: Grants permission to list existing bots

ListBotVersions.name: ListBotVersions
ListBotVersions.description: Grants permission to list existing bot versions

ListBuiltInIntents.name: ListBuiltInIntents
ListBuiltInIntents.description: Grants permission to list built-in intents

ListBuiltInSlotTypes.name: ListBuiltInSlotTypes
ListBuiltInSlotTypes.description: Grants permission to list built-in slot types

ListExports.name: ListExports
ListExports.description: Grants permission to list existing exports

ListImports.name: ListImports
ListImports.description: Grants permission to list existing imports

ListIntents.name: ListIntents
ListIntents.description: Grants permission to list intents in a bot

ListSlots.name: ListSlots
ListSlots.description: Grants permission to list slots in an intent

ListSlotTypes.name: ListSlotTypes
ListSlotTypes.description: Grants permission to list slot types in a bot

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tags for a Lex resource

PostContent.name: PostContent
PostContent.description: Sends user input (text or speech) to Amazon Lex.

PostText.name: PostText
PostText.description: Sends user input (text-only) to Amazon Lex.

PutBot.name: PutBot
PutBot.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a Amazon Lex conversational bot.

PutBotAlias.name: PutBotAlias
PutBotAlias.description: Creates or updates an alias for the specific bot.

PutIntent.name: PutIntent
PutIntent.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of an intent.

PutSession.name: PutSession
PutSession.description:
Grants permission to create a new session or modify an existing session for a bot
                                                alias and user ID

PutSlotType.name: PutSlotType
PutSlotType.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a slot type.

RecognizeSpeech.name: RecognizeSpeech
RecognizeSpeech.description: Grants permission to send user input (text or speech) to an bot alias

RecognizeText.name: RecognizeText
RecognizeText.description: Grants permission to send user input (text-only) to an bot alias

StartConversation.name: StartConversation
StartConversation.description: Grants permission to stream user input (speech/text/DTMF) to a bot alias

StartImport.name: StartImport
StartImport.description: Grants permission to start a new import with the uploaded import file
StartImport.dependentActions:
lex:CreateBot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:CreateBotLocale
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:CreateIntent
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:CreateSlot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:CreateSlotType
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteBotLocale
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteIntent
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteSlot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:DeleteSlotType
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:UpdateBot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:UpdateBotLocale
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:UpdateIntent
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:UpdateSlot
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   lex:UpdateSlotType

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite tags of a Lex resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Lex resource

UpdateBot.name: UpdateBot
UpdateBot.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot

UpdateBotAlias.name: UpdateBotAlias
UpdateBotAlias.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot alias

UpdateBotLocale.name: UpdateBotLocale
UpdateBotLocale.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot locale

UpdateExport.name: UpdateExport
UpdateExport.description: Grants permission to update an existing export

UpdateIntent.name: UpdateIntent
UpdateIntent.description: Grants permission to update an existing intent

UpdateResourcePolicy.name: UpdateResourcePolicy
UpdateResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to update an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

UpdateSlot.name: UpdateSlot
UpdateSlot.description: Grants permission to update an existing slot

UpdateSlotType.name: UpdateSlotType
UpdateSlotType.description: Grants permission to update an existing slot type
